name: Memotech MTX Series Games Collection Vol.1
overview: Claus Bækkel of www.mtxworld.dk offers here conversions of four MTX games. In Kilopede you must eliminate mushrooms and the descending segmented Kilopede. Scramble your ship to the defense of Earth in Mission Alphatron. In Astro-Pac you have to retrieve the parts of your spaceship to fly away. Battle your way through the squadron of Alien Fighters as they race from side to side in Astromilon.
